actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to eliminate the urban/rural differential in prospective payment rates for payment for inpatient hospital services under the medicare program.
short_title: Fair Medicare Treatment for Rural Hospitals Act of 1989

summary.text: Fair Medicare Treatment for Rural Hospitals Act of 1989 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to eliminate differences in average standardized Medicare payments to large urban, other urban, and rural hospitals.

titles.title: Fair Medicare Treatment for Rural Hospitals Act of 1989
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to eliminate the urban/rural differential in prospective payment rates for payment for inpatient hospital services under the medicare program.
